title: ICE: `expected exactly one expression`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust macro_rules! cbor_map { ($key:expr) => { $key.signum(); }; } fn main() { cbor_map! { #[test(test)] 4}; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (d3f416dc0 2023-05-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: d3f416dc063fc478c7250873246cb2d4136d8c42 commit-date: 2023-05-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
